content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services AI Receptionist. How can I assist you with your HVAC needs today?
Honestly, I had a terrible experience last time I used your service. The technician was late and didn't fix my AC properly. I'm frustrated.

I'm very sorry to hear about your previous experience. We want to make sure your HVAC issues are resolved quickly and properly this time. Can I please have your full name to get started on scheduling a technician?
Thank you, Jake. Can you please provide the address where our technician will be visiting?
Thanks for that, Jake. Let me check if Pineville is within our service area for HVAC support.
I'm sorry, Jake, but it looks like Pineville is currently outside our service area for HVAC jobs. Unfortunately, we won't be able to schedule a technician at that location.
